title: Awkwardly Perfect
description: Fashion is Kylie Moore’s life. High-end couture and thousand-dollar handbags make her heart sing. When she gets the chance to work at the world’s leading fashion magazine, she jumps at the opportunity. Everything is falling into place until she meets the focus of her first assignment.Levi Sanderson—the fashion-phobic billionaire CEO.Money, power, and prestige, Levi appears to have it all. The last thing he wants is a style upgrade. When the fashionista and the billionaire meet, spark fly. Will a change in plans show these two that opposites do attract? Or will a scheming assistant put the brakes on them finding their happily ever after?
author: S.E. Rose
